english: Social anthropology is one of the social sciences ..
chinese: 社会人类学是社会科学之一。

english: It is a conclusion of deep importance in ethnology .
chinese: 这个结论在人类学上是极端重要的。

english: Boas's own research spanned the scope of anthropology in its north american definition .
chinese: 博厄斯自己的研究涉及了北美人类学的整个领域。

english: An eminent anthropologist, fred gelman investigated the remnants of ancient structures .
chinese: 一位著名人类学家弗莱德吉尔曼探查过古建筑的遗迹。

english: It is the most difficult of all anthropological data on which to "draw" the old negro .
chinese: 在所有的人类学资料中，最困难的事莫过于“刻划”古代的黑人。
人类学造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The supreme need of our time is for men to learn to live together in peace and harmony .
chinese: 目前我们最迫切的需要是让人类学习共同和平与协调一致地生活。

english: It took many weary centuries for man to learn to adapt fire to his need in different ways .
chinese: 人类学会用各种各样的方法使火来适应他们的需要，经历了漫长的岁月。

english: An elusive, cambridge-trained anthropologist made his career largely in the united states .
chinese: 令人莫测高深的，剑桥大学培养出来的人类学家，他的一生主要在美国渡过。

english: As another man has an ardour for art or music, or natural science, mr. pen said that anthropology was his favourite pursuit .
chinese: 正如别人爱好艺术、音乐或自然科学那样，小潘说他爱好人类学。

english: Some parks are famous for their scenery; others have special significance for students of geology or cultural anthropology .
chinese: 有些公园以风景著名，有些对于研究地质学或人类学的学者具有特别意义。

english: Anthropologists wondered where the remote ancestors of the polyesian peoples now living  in the pacific islands came from .
chinese: 人类学家极想知道现今生活在太平洋群岛上的波利尼亚各族人的远祖是从哪里迁来的。

english: These poems, ever fresh and ever marvelous, possess an ethnological value which enhances immensely their other excellences .
chinese: 这些永垂不朽的诗篇在人类学方面很有价值，它大大地提高了这些诗篇在其它方面的卓越成就。

english: The feuds of anthropologists normally begin when someone's grand theory of our lineage is contradicted by the unearthing of a few stone or bones .
chinese: 人类学家自己内部之间的矛盾通常出现在某人关于我们世系的宏论，由于几块石头和骨头的出土而受到挑战的时候。

english: The most controversial implication of the geneticists' work is that modern human didn't slowly and inexorably evolve in different part of the world as many anthropologists believed .
chinese: 现代遗传学家的研究结果所暗示的论点最有争议。他们认为并不象许多人类学家所相信的那样-现代人类缓慢而坚稳地在世界上不同的地区进化。

english: He supposed that his readings in anthropology caused him to take such a coarse view of what was after all a simple and natural demonstrations of family feeling .
chinese: 他想自己恐怕是因为读过些人类学的东西，才产生了这样粗俗的想法，而这只不过是一种家庭气氛的简单而自然的表现。
